title: European expansion in Asia in the 19th century

content.prompt: Which of the following facilitated European expansion in Asia in the nineteenth century?

choices.label: The popularity of democratic values among Asians
A general easing of tensions and cooperative expeditions among European powers
Asians’ lack of resistance to European diseases
Europe’s ability to send numerically superior armies to Asia

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
